title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When I set aliases for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column names when I select the dataset.
SR:
1. Open the data set in the expression builder.
2. Check if the column aliases are properly displayed for each column.
3. Select the data set from the list of available data sets and verify that the expression builder shows the updated column names with aliases.
